r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.1M
  in 2020-2021 on contracts with Soucy International. The average
  contract duration was 1.02 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $5.0M. The longest
  contract was 2.71 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $11.2M.
lookup_name: 'SOUCY INTERNATIONAL'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.1M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2020-2021'
s431_number_of_contracts: '8'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '0'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '0%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: 'NA'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: 'NA'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: 'NA'
s424_mean_duration: '1.02'
s421_mean_contract_value: '5.0M'
s425_max_duration: '2.71'
s422_max_contract_value: '11.2M'
